channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fifth Third paying $10.9 billion for Comerica as wave of bank mergers builds
item.description: Fifth Third said the combined company will operate in some of the fastest-growing areas of the country, such as Texas.

item.title: Contrary to popular opinion, U.S. stocks do justify their valuations, says Morgan Stanley
item.description: Taking inflation and wider margins into account, U.S. stocks are nowehere near as expensive as they were in the late 1990s.

item.title: Social Security’s Bisignano named to additional role as CEO of IRS
item.description: The appointment would not require Senate confirmation.

item.title: This Middle East oil giant just got a nuclear big brother — and your portfolio will feel the heat
item.description: Treasury bonds, the dollar and gold are affected when a key U.S. ally no longer trusts America to protect it.
